title: Machine Learning-Based Design Concept Generation: Case-Centered Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational machine learning theories and design processes, along with programming experience
context.additional_context: Practical application-oriented training for job seekers.

learning_goals: Learners can structure input data for machine learning models by analyzing real-world design cases.
Learners can generate design concepts by applying a concept formation algorithm based on bridge design cases.
Learners can evaluate generated design concepts to derive optimal design solutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
